main.sprites.specials

Class Aura

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.sprites.Sprite
      • main.sprites.specials.Aura

  • public class Aura
extends Sprite
    Name: Jaskaranbir Dhillon
    Date: Thursday, April 22, 2016
    Class Description:

    Class defining the Aura (that Mario gets after 2nd level powerup and after which he can shoot fireballs).
    Associated Class: Mario

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean auraStateComplete 

      • Fields inherited from class main.sprites.Sprite

        playerStates, spriteBounds, spriteBoundsArray, spriteFrame, xPos, xVel, yPos, yVel

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Constructs a single aura.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableSuperAura()
      Changes White Aura to Golden Aura and marks Invincibility mode for player.
      This should only be called when player consumes ImmunityStar powerup.
      void update()
      This method should NOT be called in this class.
      Please call the overloaded version of this method and supply the player coordinates to that method instead.
      void update(float xPos, float yPos)
      Runs aura logic along with updating Aura's position to be same as Mario's position.
      void updatePosition()
      Updates position of aura on stage.

    • Field Detail

      • auraStateComplete

        public boolean auraStateComplete

    • Constructor Detail

      • Aura

        public Aura(javafx.scene.Group parent,
            float auraHeight,
            float auraWidth,
            javafx.scene.image.Image[] windEffects,
            javafx.scene.image.Image... sprites)
        Constructs a single aura.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent in which the aura resides (should be same as Mario's parent).
        auraHeight - The maximum height of aura (starts from 0 and increases till this height).
        auraWidth - Aura's width (since it is set to 0 width since we are maintaining aspect ratio of aura sprites (see aura sprites initialization in Main class)).
        windEffects - The wind effects during initial setting of aura (the blue-ish lines).
        sprites - Sprites for aura animation.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float xPos,
                   float yPos)
        Runs aura logic along with updating Aura's position to be same as Mario's position.
        Parameters:
        xPos - x-Position of player (Mario).
        yPos - y-Position of player (Mario).

      • update

        public void update()
        This method should NOT be called in this class.
        Please call the overloaded version of this method and supply the player coordinates to that method instead.
        Specified by:
        update in class Sprite

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition()
        Updates position of aura on stage. Needs to be called manually in aura logic (the update method).
        Overrides:
        updatePosition in class Sprite

      • enableSuperAura

        public void enableSuperAura()
        Changes White Aura to Golden Aura and marks Invincibility mode for player.
        This should only be called when player consumes ImmunityStar powerup.
